information

key words: Machine Learning, Classifier, YOLO, Food, Equity, Visualization

year: 2022/05

Some people who have a healthy diet, fresh produce and don’t eat sweet food (i.e. cakes, soft drinks) are still plagued with high blood sugar! It turns out there are hidden threats in fresh produce and dishes, they are high in sugar and sodium.

Food and nutrition issue pertain to the Right to healthy diets and good nutrition, Food Safety, Genetically Modified Crops, Exploitation of Workers, Lack of Equal Access, Monocrops, Diet-related non-communicable diseases (NCDs) – mainly overweight, obesity, diabetes, cardiovascular disease and cancer.

This project aims to intervene in nutritional inequalities that hinge on key sociodemographic factors, such as geographic location, age, gender, ethnicity, education and wealth.

It is targeting avoidable situations by shifting the information asymmetry regarding food nutrition and making informed decisions on food with the same price range. By the visual intervention, the project acts in “the food environment, where consumers make decisions about what to eat, that is currently inequitable for many in terms of physical access, affordability, targeting of advertising, and marketing and quality of foods.”

The program will give personalized feedback, raising awareness of dietary balance. Now the project will allow users to choose among: gout, blood sugar, cardiovascular conditions and iffy situations.

Currently, we the detector covers the 164 food categories:

CLOSE

technicality

The project is initiated with YOLO (You Only Look Once) v4, it is a fast, and reasoning globbally y about the full image and all the object in the image, YOLO gives generalizable representations of objects.(by Joseph Redmon, Santosh Divvala, Ross Girshick, Ali Farhadi. You Only Look Once: Unified, Real-Time Object Detection. arXiv:1506.02640 [cs.CV])

training:
 dataset:
  open images dataset;
  62 food classes * ~300 images(bboxes)/class = ~18k
  grocery products
 100+ hours with mAP(mean average precision) 35.6%
 not working well on:
  Generic categories: snacks/ desserts/ drinks
  Morphologically similar classes: Doughnut and Bagel; Lemon and Orange and Grapefruit; Wine and Beer and Drinks

rederencing:
 cross reference with food nutrition chart
 call up alert emoji when certain kind of risk is detected.

data: google openimages
yolo: darknet
